#text=Yesterday , I wanted to ride my bike because the weather was so nice .
#text=I got my bike out of the storage closet and noticed it had a flat tire .
#text=Since I do not have a spare tire , I had to fix it if I wanted to ride .
#text=I found my bike pump and patch kit .
#text=I pumped the tire and was able to locate the air leak .
#text=I took out the patch and applied it to the part of the tire that had the little leak .
#text=I had to be careful not to overfill the tire so the patch would n't pop off .
#text=Once I was sure the patch would n't come off , I made sure that I pumped the air into the tire sufficiently .
#text=I tested the tire by sitting on the bike and riding around a little .
#text=The tire seemed to hold , so I was ready to go on my bike ride .
#text=It was such a nice day and I had a great day riding my bike .
